reviewText:
I love this film.  I am obsessed with it.  wanted to see more ....like when Yochay and Shira got engagged.....wanted to see their relationship grow....
and wanted to see Yochay's tenderness towards Shira.  I wish the editing was more elaborate..... and I wanted to know what Shira wrote to the Rabbi in her note to him.......  where can I find it.
Excellent film. While plot is set in Israel, the story is universally applicable. Well worth the time to watch. Subtitles well done.
